entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
